code: @After public void close() {     if (this.context != null) {         this.context.close().     } }

private void load(Class<?> config, String... environment) {     AnnotationConfigApplicationContext context = new AnnotationConfigApplicationContext().     TestPropertyValues.of(environment).applyTo(context).     if (config != null) {         context.register(config).     }     context.register(PropertyPlaceholderAutoConfiguration.class, CouchbaseAutoConfiguration.class, CouchbaseDataAutoConfiguration.class, CouchbaseRepositoriesAutoConfiguration.class, CouchbaseReactiveDataAutoConfiguration.class, CouchbaseReactiveRepositoriesAutoConfiguration.class).     context.refresh().     this.context = context. }
